title: Menu for single day
description: Structure of a single menu. Note: this is not API documentation; do not rely on it.

open.description: If set to `true`, the resto is open, otherwise not. Note that some days may simply not be available in the API.

message.description: A message to be displayed. Used for exceptional closures or changes in the menu. For example, if `open` is `false`, the message could be an explanation for the closure.

kind.description: The kind of the meal. Expected values are currently `meat`, `fish`, `soup`, `vegetarian` or `vegan`. Applications must be able to handle changes to the possible values.

type.description: The meal type. Is currently `main` or `side`, but applications must be able to handle changes to the possible values.
